needs: Ola seeks part-time growth marketing opportunities that enable delivering measurable improvements in key performance indicators such as LTV, activation, and retention. They need clear outcome definitions and constraints upfront to design pragmatic architectures and processes, using data-driven experimentation to surface unknowns early and iterate efficiently while balancing governance and budget controls.
personality: Ola is direct, transparent, and data-driven, valuing reliability, craftsmanship, and velocity. They focus on clear accountability, simple and humane processes, and continuous improvement through small, observable increments. Ola collaborates cross-functionally with clarity, mentors peers, and prefers experiments over debates, using prototypes and decision logs to keep momentum and alignment visible.
